response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, which I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to me, has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. I understand its worth to you is estimated at $800,000, but I hope this offer presents a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
